title: Malaysia’s ex-PM Mahathir quits Pejuang party he founded, picks GTA as new political platform | The Straits Times
snippet: KUALA LUMPUR - Malaysia’s former premier Mahathir Mohamad has quit Parti Pejuang Tanah Air, a Malay party he founded just over two years ago, indicating a split in political direction with his son Mukhriz Mahathir, who currently heads the party.

title: Gerakan Tanah Air - Wikipedia
snippet: Gerakan Tanah Air (GTA, Homeland Movement or Homeland Party) is an alliance of Malay political parties, founded in August 2022 by former Prime Minister of Malaysia Mahathir Mohamad. Mahathir had announced during the coalition's founding that GTA will contest in the next Malaysian general election ...

title: Gerakan Tanah Air (GTA) - Dr Mahathir Mohamad
snippet: All members of the Malaysian House of Representatives and the State Assembly ( the state legislature ) who support the GTA are members of the Parti Pejuang Tanah Air ( PEJUANG ). Tun Dr.
